channel.title: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP
channel.description: The title says it all.... how do i change the ip on hybrid PvP v3.... i never tried to code this kind of servers. SOMEONE HELP!!!! ILL REP++++++++++++++

item.title: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

open client.java and search server =
and there should be a ip in there change it to 127.0.0.1 or whatever ip you want it to be also search in gui.java InetAddress.getByName and change the ip in quotes to whatever ip you want it to be then save and compile and run the client and it should work

Read full topic
item.source: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP

item.title: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP
item.dc:creator: @Decronix Decronix
item.description:
@Decronix wrote:

Open up client.java
search for ( Ctr + F )
server =
Keep pressign next until you find

server = "127.0.0.0"

( Or any other ip )
then copy that Ip, press control + H
and replace any other similar IP’s with your IP.
then go to Your GUI.java
and do as the dude and top of me, said.

Read full topic
item.source: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP

item.title: [REP++]How Do I Change the ip on Hybrid PvP
item.dc:creator: @godalmighty godalmighty
item.description:
@godalmighty wrote:

Go to the gui.java file and search for

Server ip =
if you cant find anything try

127.0.0.1

or 0.0.0.0
